title: Way of the Samurai 4: DLC Pack (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
1. Download and extract
1. Run the exe installer
3. Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS GAME! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: WAY OF THE SAMURAI 4: DLC PACK
Genre: Action - Adventure - Historical
Works on: Windows (7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio only: æ—¥æœ¬èªž. Text only: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: July 23, 2015
Size: 11.8 MB
Company: ACQUIRE Corp. / Ghostlight LTD
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/way_of_the_samurai_4_dlc_pack

About:
Way of the Samurai 4: DLC Pack includes Where Are They Now? Set, Ryoma Sakamoto, and Shinsengumi Set.
Where Are They Now? Set
A new mission set that unlocks custom parts and original weapons. Play as a young Dona Dona or older Sayo from Way of the Samurai 1 & 2. Includes character models, accessories, and Volcano and Wildgrass weapons. Available after working for Rihito Shirube in the main plaza.
Ryoma Sakamoto
A set of custom parts, original weapons and new missions. Play as Ryoma Sakamoto. Includes character model, 'Revolutionary' clothing set, the Mutsunokami Yoshiyuki sword and Sakamoto's Wakizashi accessory, all selectable from the game's onset. Also includes the M2 Revolver, purchasable from the specter in the cemetery. 
*Note: You must be proficient with firearms to use the M2 Revolver.
Shinsengumi Set
A new mission set that unlocks custom parts and original weapons. Join the Shinsengumi. Includes character model, dandara-patterned haori coat, accessories, Kotetsu and Izuminokami Kanesada weapons and a western wear model featuring a Toshizo Hijikata motif. Available after working for Rihito Shirube in the main plaza.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 64Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Hard Drive: 7 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

Recommended system requirements - Windows: 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 128Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Hard Drive: 7 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
